TEXT_CUSTOM_TEMPLATES_INFO: Here you can define custom email templates for each type of email we send to your users.
TEXT_SEPARATE_TEMPLATES_INFO: You can define separate templates for each site, if desired.
TEXT_MULTIPLE_ALL_DOMAINS_WARNING: Warning! You have multiple templates set to render for All Domains. Only the first one will be used.
TEXT_RENDER_ERRORS_NOTE: This means the template failed to send recently due to errors in the syntax.
TEXT_NO_CUSTOM_TEMPLATES: No custom templates for this email.
